bibl.title: Local Politics in the Late Republic: Antony and Cleopatra at Patras.
bibl.note: Two Late Roman Republican coins from Patras are investigated: one with a portrait of Cleopatra and the second signed by Agys Aischrionos. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Emily Haug, Local Politics in the Late Republic: Antony and Cleopatra at Patras.
Two Late Roman Republican coins from Patras are investigated: one with a portrait of Cleopatra and the second signed by Agys Aischrionos. - Avec résumé en anglais.
